title: Decentralized
description: Decentralization refers to the property of a system in which nodes or actors work in concert in a distributed fashion to achieve a global goal.

props.body: Decentralization refers to the property of a system in which nodes or actors work in concert in a distributed fashion to achieve a global goal. The delegation of power from a central authority to regional and local authorities
